website_summaries.verdict: This large scoop has a substantial feel and a unique trigger release that is both a selling point when it works, and a major frustration when it malfunctions.
pros: Features a tough stainless steel construction with a coated ribbed handle that's easy to grip
size is ideal for customers who prefer larger scoops of ice cream
cons: Although it has a handy trigger to release ice cream from the scoop, the mechanism has the tendency to jam or quit working altogether

customer_reviews.title: This is not a Vollrath product, it is Thunder ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a Vollrath product, it is Thunder Group, made in China and very cheap and flimsy. This broke the 3rd time I used it. I will be calling Amazon for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: That it is a worthless purchase and I will be more careful to shop in a store
customer_reviews.text: It is very light weight and wobbly and doesn’t scoop ice cream hardly at all. It has the ability of a plastic toy
customer_reviews.author: shraronulam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: High quality ice cream scooper. Right-handed lever. Easy to clean. Easy to use even though, it’s huge. Perfect portion for ice cream, burger patties, rice, mashed potatoes and baking use. I would purchase this again if needed and recommend this to family or friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy ice cream scoop.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ice cream scoop. I saw a lot of other options online and in stores that had negative reviews because the triggers are flimsy and break, but this one is very sturdy and strong. It’s a large scoop (4 oz), which is nice. I use it with ice cream straight out of the freezer and as long as you have the strength to push it in, the scoop seems ready and able to get the job done. I also like the deep dome shape. The ice cream presents nicely to company, and it doubles as an egg scoop when I have to drop them into boiling water without cracking them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria EliasTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Especially great if you're on a diet
customer_reviews.text: I work in a care facility, and we use scoops like this to do portion control. This is great for home use to because it lets you scoop out a 1/2 cup serving of anything. This is especially great if you're on a diet and tracking your calories. I cook a big batch of quinoa to last me all week, but I only eat 1/2 cup for breakfast. I can scoop out 1/2 cup servings into one storage container, and they are ready to be transferred to my breakfast bowl each morning.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Super Great Ice Cream/Food Scoop!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent ice cream/food scoop! Very well made, and looks great also! I use it not just to scoop ice cream...but I also use it to scoop mashed potatoes, potato salad, macaroni salad, and even individual meatloaf scoops. This would also make a great gift! Wrap a ribbon around the handle, and attach it to a container of cold salad (macaroni, potato, tuna) or ice cream. They will love it!
customer_reviews.author: TFD

customer_reviews.title: Solid and durable but tough to use on ice cream just taken out of the freezer.
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, great for the price but a little difficult to scoop ice cream when taken out of freezer. I’m not an ice cream expert so this may be the same with any ice cream scooper. However, it is durable as it has not broke or had any pieces fall off as I’ve had happen with similar products.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: The Disher
customer_reviews.text: This disher is amazing and works right out of the box. Perfect portions every time and extremely easy to clean. Color coded handles make it easy to determine if you are using the correct size. Highly recommend getting these and will continue to purchase for the foreseeable future. Very happy and positively recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lieberum

customer_reviews.title: Great product in the exact size you need
customer_reviews.text: I got this 1/2 cup scoop for a meal I was serving to 200 people. I was looking for a specific size scoop when I got online and was really excited to see this company had various sizes that were color coded. It worked perfectly to scoop potato salad and I like the color coded idea so well and the quality of the scoop that I will like be buying other scoops from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Len Pope

customer_reviews.title: This wasn't exactly what I hoped for......but it is a 4 oz scoop.
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this scoop and unfortunately it wasn't the same one advertised. I really like the Vollrath brand and quality so I returned this one which is a cheaper 'knock-off'. Beware of who you buy from because there are those who'll sell the fakes and put a sticker on the box saying 'Vollrath'. It was disappointing to say the least. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Marie

customer_reviews.title: really big
customer_reviews.text: this is a really big scoop, so if you want alot of ice cream it will work. def not for use for cookies unless u want giant thin cookies.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will be a sturdy tool for dipping ice ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received it a week or so ago and haven't had a chance to use it. Looks like it will be a sturdy tool for dipping ice cream, although the size 8 is larger than I would have purchased for an ice cream scoop had I seen the actual tool. no problems with the seller and delivery was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool
customer_reviews.text: This has instantly become one of my favorite baking tools. I baked cookies using this tool and I must say the cookies came out looking like what you would find in a bakery/cookie shop. Easy to use and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: We got this for portioning dog food which it's been very good for, and then I wanted other sizes for baking. These have made a huge difference with cookies and muffins. I am getting consistently even portions that are very easy to separate from the disher rather than needed to use my fingers or another utensil. The mechanism has been very reliable and it's easy to clean. We had tried a different brand as well, but the Vollrath is superior (works every time without getting stuck).
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M

customer_reviews.title: The grey is too big for ice cream - and an unappetizing color :P
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this for ice cream, but it's too big! (the grey is not an attractive color, either. At all.) Kept it anyway--sometimes, it's just too much time & trouble to return things. Hoping we'll use it to shape hamburgers.
customer_reviews.author: Colored Ink

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be of very good quality. MUCH bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of very good quality. MUCH bigger than expected. My fault for not reading description properly. 4 oz sounded small but its large even for an ice cream scoop!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Not for ice cream
customer_reviews.text: When I was a kid we used one exactly like this for ice cream. It did not work very well. It is perfect for portion control. We use it for muffins and drop biscuits. Sometimes for rice. Makes a neat round stack on the serving plate.
customer_reviews.author: Wondering

customer_reviews.title: Commercial duty! Super well-made.
customer_reviews.text: Commercial duty. Will usually last a lifetime. I use it To make meatballs and hamburger patties. So easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Great Scoop!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic ice cream scoop. However, the size I got is definitely larger than I thought it would be. That's on me, though.
customer_reviews.author: Biscuit

customer_reviews.title: My newest baking tool !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use for making muffins. Instead of using a large spoon to move batter into muffin tins i just scoop now. Much easier, and accomplished in a single scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to use and scoops cookie dough!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for scooping cookie dough and it has held up well. Easy to clean. The handle and button are slightly uncomfortable to use but other than that I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This scoop means business. It's sturdy, easy to use. It seems like it going to stand the test of time. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Meat Matters
customer_reviews.text: I got this to scoop up perfect quarter pound of hamburger meat to make smashed burgers! Will of course use for other dishes, but I got it to make perfect smashed burgers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, good feel
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, haven’t used it yet!! But def worth the money, better than our last one.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary E Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Scooping in the dollars!
customer_reviews.text: I used this all season scooping ice cream for making Milkshakes at my Biergarten. No signs of wearing out or breaking as of yet!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ireland

customer_reviews.title: ... in time if we use it for heavy stuff like ice cream
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit worried about the plastic handle cracking in time if we use it for heavy stuff like ice cream, but as a disher - it is lightweight, fits well in hand , functions VERY smoothly and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: L&N's Mommie

customer_reviews.title: Not a good first impression
customer_reviews.text: Came out of the box with a chip or defect. When the trigger is squeezed the mechanism is a little gravely and the spring sometimes catches and arrests in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Old School
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I love the vintage look and feel. Feels sturdy enough to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: The scooper doesn't work. The ice cream doesn't come out of the scooper. It's hard to use. Used it 2 times and gave it up for a plastic one
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Saul

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but too clumsy for left handers
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this scoop is very difficult to use if you are left handed.
customer_reviews.author: PMcQ

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t find a sturdy scooper, we are pleased with this item. Seems like it will last , would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good scooper
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good scooper. It is much larger than I expected (larger than a normal scoop).
customer_reviews.author: Josefin Bruin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this to pack my 8 oz gelato containers works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Rich R

customer_reviews.title: Well made and good for scooping up batter
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheap one before and it broke when I tried to scooped up the cookie batter. This is seems much stronger.
customer_reviews.author: seanco

customer_reviews.title: Use for eating disorder
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I struggled with anorexia and so my dietitian recommended I use this so that I do not "under" plate myself. Great way to make sure you are taking an appropriate portion.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Rhoden

customer_reviews.title: Feels weak scooping hard ice cream
customer_reviews.text: It hasn't broken yet, but I feel that day is not long off.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Well-made
customer_reviews.text: Well-constructed but too large for my purposes. My error in ordering, though, not a flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Organgrinder1010

customer_reviews.title: Like I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Good that it was sold with oz measurement.
customer_reviews.author: D. Heithold

customer_reviews.title: Great value and last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: We've been through about five of similar dishers in the past two years. The ones made by Update were the worst, one of them lasted about a week. These Vollraths, however, are built to last substantial abuse. We won't settle for less again! The reason for the 4-star is because the ergonomic of the pusher is not very well design, but still better than most.
customer_reviews.author: P Siri

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for a year, it works fine for everything I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I own three sizes. The number 6 is huge. The 4 0z. seems like the one that will get the most use. I am satisfied. Did not really expect it to be what I wanted, but these are quality products.
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy piece!
customer_reviews.text: American Legion kitchen. This was purchased to help home cooks learn portion control.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 cup serving scoop
customer_reviews.text: Needed a half cup serving scoop. Has worked well and lasted.
customer_reviews.author: EO

customer_reviews.title: Too big, and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I wanted. Scoop size is way too big and the scooper is light and flimsy. Feels cheap, like it will break. We are not satisfied and I will have to buy a better scooper soon.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: very nice large scoop
customer_reviews.text: very nice large scoop! easy smooth release. I make my own dog food and use this for portions. i am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very similar to Grandma's scoop!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made scoop, like the one I have from my grandmother. I didn't realize this was such a large scoop, however, so I will be ordering a couple much smaller ones to fit my needs. What I really wanted was a cookie scoop, and this one is bigger than the average ice cream scoop, just for your own size reference.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D. Teague

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Nothing life changing, it's an ice cream scoop. Nonetheless, it's a great alternative to a plastic scoop and provides "Daddy Sized" quantities.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Warner

customer_reviews.title: Makes the perfect portion for you muffin pan.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to measure out 4 ozs of my turkey meatloaf. I scoop it then place it in my muffin pan. This makes the job so very easy. I then can freeze them in my food saver bags for future meals.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Americo

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This my second. First went to my sisters church for dinners. This one for me:) So I can measure out yogurt.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa One/Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Ice Cream Scoop
customer_reviews.text: It was just a bit to large. Not good for Ice Cream scoops, but maybe for mashed potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Scoop for Portion Control
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a quick way to measure food portions. This item is perfect in that it is of the correct half-cup size, works smoothly, and expels the food completely from the scoop. Recommended for anyone who is seriously controlling the amount of food being consumed.
customer_reviews.author: Jude1938

customer_reviews.title: Not for ice cream!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s to flimsy to really scoop any ice cream out, but useful for portioning cake batter :) do not buy this for ice cream!!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Kaushal

customer_reviews.title: The Right Size
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect size amount for ice cream, making meat balls or perparing cookie dough to bake. Many uses! A must have for your kitchen tools.
customer_reviews.author: DALIA

customer_reviews.title: Very handy tool for the home baker.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, releases its contents with little effort and makes portioning things like frosting quick and with no mess.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use it mostly to dip cookie dough. It works great
customer_reviews.author: Janie Crystal Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Works well as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works well as adver tised. Took me awhile read ing the instruction, in the end it pays off. Effective and easy to use, prefectly unit for a purchase. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hillel kober

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: It worked well while it worked, but it broke within the first month or so. I'm ordering a second one to see if I got a lemon the first time.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Equal proportions!
customer_reviews.text: This worked like a charm scooping up even amounts of goodies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this scoop, I use it most of the time for ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: James Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great hamburger scoop!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scoop to make hamburger patties. It is the perfect size. It works great and cleans easily.

customer_reviews.title: Best disher for all your scooping needs
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Don’t waste your money on cheap product, get this first and have exactly what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Works great
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Works great. Heavy duty, stainless gears. Don't settle for inferior products especially those with plastic parts as they fail under stress.
customer_reviews.author: Light Sleeper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Can be used for ice cream and cupcake or muffin batter so the items are portion controlled for a better end product. Would use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: fanfic  nutcase

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these scoopers for water ice, it broke after my third use. Too pricey to break so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Traneya Hymon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the Only Professional DISHER you should buy ! Thx. Chef,dc on Mixcrate.com

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, very sturdy and washes easily. will be buying more

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like it was used. The material was rusted
customer_reviews.author: Xue

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a little larger scoop for ice cream to save time in serving. This filled the bill nicely and is very well built. I will use it a lot for other things also !
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We like our scoops jumbo-sized and this product is perfect for us. Also works great for some side dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality scoop, especially the size choices, definitley buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MonkeyDog

customer_reviews.title: toughly built
customer_reviews.text: the scoop isn't the best for ice cream but great for portion control. Very tough built and feels like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the restaurant I work at,it didn’t last a week,a definition of a piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Cuthbert

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, item was as expected. I wanted to use it for 4 oz cookies, but when scooped they actually were more like 6 oz, which is too big. But it works great for muffins. I'm sure I'll find other good uses for it too.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: Make big big cookies I love it and I the best and will be buying more very very very soon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Still not sturdy as promised. I have been on the search for a sturdy scoop...still searching

customer_reviews.title: OK product could be a little more sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A bit flimsy. Fine for portion control and dishing up potatoes, and cold salads but not great for ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this twice and was sent the incorrect scoop. A black size 30 scoop was inside the box for a size 8. Nice quality control
customer_reviews.author: tpftony

customer_reviews.title: We now use this for scooping other things like potato salad
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this scoop for ice cream, but realized that I had no concept of what 4 oz. was. It's much too big for an ice cream scoop (have since ordered the 2 oz. version). We now use this for scooping other things like potato salad, etc. For that it works well.
customer_reviews.author: JimC

customer_reviews.title: Not the best I have
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed in the quality of the stainless on this product. I have an older 1 oz. version of this and it is really nice. The stainless looks like it is about to get rusty at any time if I don't dry it immediately and thoroughly after every use. Compared to my little one, the shine factor is just not even there. I regret not buying one of these about 15 years ago when I got my small one.
customer_reviews.author: Yahhr

customer_reviews.title: Quality has decreased
customer_reviews.text: Release handle bent, scoop bar out of place. Does not push out entire scoop
customer_reviews.author: Darla Cottrill

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a bit large?
customer_reviews.text: Searching for the perfect ice-cream scoop, like this one quite a bit but it's a heavy-duty piece of hardware, so it's maybe a bit large and awkward to operate even though I'm a guy with larger than average hands. A slimmer or contoured handgrip might improve the ergonomics. All the mechanical aspects are very nicely and solidly engineered.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas F. Marks

customer_reviews.title: THis thing is HUGE
customer_reviews.text: That's what she said! I used to get 3-5 scoops per meal, I mean desert, and now with this scooper I can cut down to 2-3 scoops and still pig out. I run it under hot water for a second so it cuts into the ice cream easier. Even the hard ice cream you gotta put your body weight into it doesn't break or bend. (Will update if that changes). The lever pushes the ice cream out with ease. then just rinse it under hot water for a second and then throw it back in the drawer, because I'm a bachelor, why wash it?
customer_reviews.author: ImCrazyNate

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN THE USA!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality ice cream cone size scoop. The maker has nine sizes, color coded plastic handles. The grey handle is size 2 13/16, next to the largest size scoop. The box says "USA MADE" but does not indicate the state. It appears to be made to last a long time, and at a good price. MAT in Sun City Center, FL
customer_reviews.author: MAT in Sun City Center,FL

customer_reviews.title: Get consistent sized hamburgers
customer_reviews.text: Hamburger scoop! I purchased this to measure my hamburgers. I got the Aluminum Burger Press by 5 Star. It is hard to judge how much hamburger to use each time. Overfill a press and you have a mess. Not enough and you keep adding. The #8 makes 1/4 pound patty and the #6 makes 1/3 pound patty. Pack them level full. I also have the larger Blackstone Grill. I take the #6 and put a scoop on the grill. I then press it to my thickness with a Lodge Bacon weight. Never touch the hamburger at all. I use 85% lean and never press the burger after it hits the pan
customer_reviews.author: Siddigger

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: We suffered with a cheap ice cream scooper for years. I finally decided that enough was enough and that it was time for another one. After skimming through pages of ice cream scoopers and reading reviews, we decided to try this one out. We love it! Sturdy and easy to use! Perfect for our ice cream needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not as sturdy as it looks
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my restaurant. This my third replacement. They tend to break at the point the scoop meets the handle and the metal rod that extends in to the plastic handle does not extend far enough and the plastic handle eventually breaks off under hard use. Not the quality I would expect from a Volrath labeled product. As a follow up, the third scoop broke at the same spot after a few months restaurant use.
customer_reviews.author: D. McKay

customer_reviews.title: Portion Control 101
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. No problems scooping. Now I can buy the larger tubs of ice cream and mix fruit in a bowl to match the scoop size. Very easy to rinse off.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Cornbill

customer_reviews.title: It scoops ice cream
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to scoop the ice cream. I used to work in restaurants and recognized the Vollrath name, which is what most restaurants use for portioners/scoopers, so I bought it. It's as quality as what restaurants use, and those things last years with constant daily abuse. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Russell

customer_reviews.title: Quality/ worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are worth the money. Tried a cheaper brand and several broke way too easily. These have held up very well!
customer_reviews.author: JeremeyMT

customer_reviews.title: Working Great So Far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help portion ground beef for Burgers. I suppose I could have just used a Ramekin or something but this works and will come in handy for other food stuff. No regrets to date.
customer_reviews.author: XetaPrime

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size Scoop
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Great price, restaurant quality and dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this I was not sure of the sizing to choose. It is definitely bigger then I expected it to be (more ice cream for me then). It works great. Seems to be made out of quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn Guiffredo

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased better products of this type that don't carry the Vollrath ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a more robust product. The gears are definitely not smooth moving. I have purchased better products of this type that don't carry the Vollrath name and the are much better. I like that they are color coded, but I won't buy another one by this brand. It gets the job done but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: s593tp

customer_reviews.title: Great Scoop ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's birthday party and it's very handy and easy to use! It is very durable! I love this new scoop!
customer_reviews.author: LaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLa

customer_reviews.title: but this is a great scooper (easy to use and very durable
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, for the price I was expecting something kind of shoddy, but this is a great scooper (easy to use and very durable.). I would recommend it ot anyone who bus ice cream on even a semi regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, holding up well
customer_reviews.text: A good sturdy scooper. I use it a lot for my dogs food, it’s holding up well
customer_reviews.author: 2hounds

customer_reviews.title: Easy fix to portion control!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a way to get an exact portion for a meal fundraiser. I bought three of these and they worked very well. One-half cup portion of potato salad, coleslaw, and beans!
customer_reviews.author: DCraig

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: Wow. It’s huge. Makes HUGE ice cream scoops. It’s nice, no doubt, but large and bulky in my drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Xine

customer_reviews.title: Scoopers make life easier
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Food easily drops from scooper. Great size for making hamburger patties. I no longer have to guesstimate how big to make my hamburger/meatloaf patties.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Over sized scoop
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but boy does it have a big portion in that one scoop.
customer_reviews.author: JF SACCO

product_meta.title: Vollrath 4 oz. Stainless Steel Disher
product_meta.description: This dishers is constructed of a fully color-coded polypropylene handle with component parts is made from stainless steel. Handle is ribbed surface and built-in stopper notch to prevent slippage. Handle equipped with Agion antimicrobial protection. Handle construction is a one-piece design with no crevices to collect water or bacteria. Bowl dimensions is exact to insure consistent capacities within 5 percent. Capacities must be clearly stamped on the top side of the gear rack for easy identification, disher number is stamped on the sweep. It is NSF certified. Available in No.8-size, 4-ounce capacity and gray handle. Measures 2-13/16-inch width by 9-9/16-inch height.
feature_bullets: NSF certified dishers has molded one-piece handle improves durability, makes cleaning easy and prevents handle from coming apart
Stainless steel bowl and components to prevent corrosion and insure longer life; blade extends beyond bowl to prevent sticking
Color-coded handle for no-guess size selection; extended grooved handle provides a sure grip for comfortable use
Coated handles are equipped with Agion antimicrobial protection for food safety
4-Ounce capacity and gray handle.Intended for Commercial/Restaurant Use
